name: Real City Attack Crow Hunting
description:
Real City Attack Crow Hunting game is designed especially for those people who really like to hunt flying birds using jungle sniper retro shoot in forest killing 3d game and want to play a cool and ultimate Crow hunting shooting game in smash City. You have to aim on the Crow with 3d hunting sniper like a hunter killer in the City.Real City Attack Crow Hunting is for those passionate gamers who are getting tired of typical sniper shooting games and want some new fun and adventure. So finally a new and advance sniper shooting game.
Real City Attack Crow Hunting game provide Realistic City shooting environment. Hunting is a great fun if you want to try it in real life this game provides complete chance to hunt down furious crow. You must have played other hunting games, sniper shooting game, City game but it is unique in the sense. This is a brand new real hunting and sniper shooting game.The game is for those people who can’t risk their life in hunting, they can enjoy real bird hunting experience by playing this game. It is a stunning FPS hunting simulator game.You are in a deep City and sniper gun in your hand suddenly you see many crazy crows fly on your head. They are greedy and in searching of their prey. Advanced sniper gun is in your hand take the aim and shoot right on the spot to take down. You have no other choice to avoid so target and shot down wild angry crows.
Real City Attack Crow Hunting game is always a fascination to a great number of people in the hunting season in this world from very beginnings. Here is hunting sniper game for entertainment with a great experience of City 3d flying Crow Hunting. Suppose you are hired by an airport regulatory department as a crow hunter. You are on mission to clear the area from crows as they are creating problems during flight take off and landing i.e. crow collide with airplanes or distract pilots. City crow hunting lets you shoot out the crows at real time in the most adventuring environment. You are equipped with powerful sniper gun take the aim and shoot right on the spot. On completing missions you will be given assassin shooter title. Don’t let crows to escape from your sniper gun bullet. You have limited time so hold your breath and show your shooting skills and let the crows die in blackout.


Real City Attack Crow Hunting Features:

- Realistic 3D graphics and awesome environment.
- Game Play is simple yet entertaining.
- Easy To Control the hunting sniper 
- Environments are natural and true to life.
- Simple but eye catching game play.
- Genuine sniper shooting experience.
- Real simulation of birds.
- Immersive hunting missions to complete.
- Natural jungle environment.
- Ultimate hunting action.
- Its a Paid game available on app store.
